function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate design of pedestrian passages in car parking areas","Impact":"Increased risk of congestion and close contact between pedestrians","Mitigation":"Provide clear and defined pedestrian routes, distinctive colors for pedestrian areas, and high-quality lighting","Technologies":"Quality lighting systems, wayfinding signage, surveillance cameras","People":"Pedestrians, car park users","Owner":"Designers, architects, car park operators"},{"Description":"Lack of monitoring in parking areas leading to obstruction of circulation passages","Impact":"Potential hindrance to emergency evacuation and increased risk of close contact between pedestrians","Mitigation":"Implement suitable monitoring systems in the parking area to prevent obstruction of circulation passages","Technologies":"Surveillance cameras, automated monitoring systems","People":"Car park operators, security personnel","Owner":"Car park operators, property management"},{"Description":"Inefficient design of large car parking leading to queues back onto the public roadway","Impact":"Increased risk of traffic congestion, close contact between drivers, and potential spread of airborne diseases","Mitigation":"Design efficient circulation roadways and gates to avoid queues, and plan large parking for long-stay and/or frequent users","Technologies":"Traffic management systems, gate automation systems","People":"Drivers, commuters","Owner":"Transport authorities, car park operators"}]}
